short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlock the world of reading! A friendly assistant that turns on-screen text into speech.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlock the world of reading! A friendly assistant that turns on-screen text into speech, helping young learners and kids with dyslexia understand and enjoy content on any webpage. Just click, listen, and learn with ReaderClue!
